archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0210
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Change Appointment Booking with LFC, Vodafone's own OnNet Access, Downer, IBM - Cisco and other high-end device installation for complex products

properties.value: Is this about customer changing the appointment or the technician? If the technician then what is the flow in such case? How is BSS/Customer notified? Integration or directly in CRM?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
